mdRecord.dcterms:title: Pocket surgical instrument set
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: George Tiemann & Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contained in leather and metal case; label on inside: Manuf. of Surgical Instr., Geo. Tiemann & Co., 67 Chatham St., New York; set includes: scalpel, probe-point bistoury; tenetome, sharp-point bistoury; tenaculum, gum lancet - metal and tortoise shell; forceps, bulldog artery; forceps, fenestrated artery; probe; director.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus
